Ramhorn/Injector/Manterror/Double Punch:




Manterror put in the code required, Double Punch's quarter's doors sliding 
open.  "What the..." he said slowly, seeing his two teammates unconsciouss.  
Kicking each of them, they awoke.

"I didn't give a strong enough dose to that Maximal!" Double Punch yelled.  
"Come on!  We can still get him!" he yelled, Injector, Double Punch, and 
Manterror getting outside.

"He went that way!" Double Punch, used to tracking victims down and murdering 
them.


---

Ramhorn had slowed down quite a bit, 2 thirds of the way to the Ark.  He was 
damaged, and his time with internal repairs had only helped so much.  Running 
like he had been doing had distrupted the repairs and opened wounds.  
"Ramhorn, maximize!" he yelled, transforming into his biped mode.  Starting 
to walk towards the Ark, two explosions when off near him, sending him 
falling backwards, almost losing his balance.

Injector ran up, swinging wide at Ramhorn, but Ramhorn blocked it with one 
arm, punching Injector in the stomach, then kneeing him in the face, sending 
him toppling over.  Manterror and Double Punch came running after him over a 
hill, firing ion disks and missiles.  The shots all missed though, but they 
did create noticable damage to the terrain.  Raising the stinger missile 
launcher he had stolen from Injector, Ramhorn fired four missiles, two 
hitting in front of Double Punch, the others inf ront of Manterror, tripping 
the Predacons.  
"Slag my injuries!" Ramhorn yelled, going to beast mode and heading for the 
Ark as fast as he could.
